home.p: Ven y experimenta la máxima experiencia de lectura en nuestro acogedor café, con sabrosos bocados y una colección de clásicos que satisfacen todos los gustos.

abtUs.description: Breve explicación sobre el nombre del café y el hecho de que “Capricho” significa antojo en español. Algo de información de fondo sobre el grupo pequeño de emprendedores, lo básico. Esta página funciona bien porque es para una startup y porque este lugar tiene una historia en mi cabeza que merece ser contada.

notificationToast.body: Hola! Hemos recibido tu sugerencia, nos pondremos en contacto contigo por correo electrónico.

lateralTab.content: ¿Quieres obtener más detalles sobre los clubes de lectura? ¡Solo pasa el cursor sobre ellos! ¿Quieres sugerirnos una idea de club? Haz clic en el horario para completar el formulario y nos pondremos en contacto contigo al respecto.

libraryCollection.title: Library Collection
libraryCollection.description: Short description of the way the library system works. A lil talk about the classics maybe talk abt the booking system.

cafeAndMenu.title: Café and Menu
cafeAndMenu.description: Specs about the menu, the time at which each menu happens, maybe talk about the chef.

au1.author: Maurice Leblanc
au1.title: On how to write a classy burglar
au1.description: Join renowned creator of Arsène Lupin, Maurice Leblanc, for a workshop on creating a character with dubious morals but plenty of finesse. Discover the art of crafting a sophisticated and charming thief, master the elements of suspense and intrigue, and learn how to weave captivating plots that keep readers hooked. Unleash your imagination and bring your own elegant rogue to life.

au2.author: Agatha Christie
au2.title: Send chills down your readers spines
au2.description: Join the legendary queen of mystery, Agatha Christie, for an immersive workshop on crafting suspenseful narratives that will leave your readers on the edge of their seats. Learn the secrets of building tension, developing unforgettable characters, and creating twists that will keep your audience guessing until the very end.

au3.author: Jane Austen
au3.title: Write your own, prideful Lover Boy
au3.description: Step into the elegant world of Jane Austen and discover how to create charming and complex characters with a touch of pride. In this workshop, you'll learn from the master of romantic fiction how to develop intriguing plots, witty dialogue, and captivating love interests that resonate with readers. Unleash your creativity and craft a timeless story filled with romance and social commentary.

au4.author: Nicolás Maquiavelo
au4.title: Book reading of “The Prince”
au4.description: Join us for a captivating book reading of 'The Prince' by Nicolás Maquiavelo, where you'll delve into the intricate world of political strategy and leadership. Experience the timeless wisdom of Machiavelli as we explore his profound insights on power, governance, and human nature. This event promises to be an enlightening journey through one of history's most influential works on political philosophy.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: The longer description about how the schedule works, probably more content about the clubs. Actually, it'll probably mainly be an introduction to the clubs and whatnot.

clubs.title: Clubs
clubs.description: Will be explaining the requirements of a club, it'll discuss the number of members, how they will deal with the catering and so on and so forth. They are more informal than events.

paidEvents.title: Paid Events
paidEvents.description: The more serious stuff since it involves authors reaching out to them or vice versa for events regarding the author's book's marketing and whatnot. A brief explanation as to why these are paid.

damagedBooks.title: Damaged Book Policy
damagedBooks.description: Yes, they do lend the books and yes you can read and eat, but the place has very old books that can be easily damaged and require costly repairs.

toast.confirmMsg: Are you sure you want to proceed with the

tab.title: Register
tab.description: Registering for an event? Pick your event and the date, you can see all our events in the corresponding tab. Club? Select that option, pick your club, and register. It's free! (For more info, see our schedule)

tab.title: Our Collection
tab.content: Wanna borrow a book? Just click on 'borrow'. We presently allow one book per person, so if you want to select a different book than the one you got, click on that one. Please keep in mind that all reservations are considered for 'the day of' and we work with a first-come, first-served system.
